items.name: typealias Unicode.UTF32.Parser.Encoding
items.desc: The encoding with which this parser is associated

items.name: init()
items.desc: Constructs an instance that can be used to begin parsing CodeUnits at any Unicode scalar boundary.

items.name: func parseScalar<I>(from: inout I) -> Unicode.ParseResult<Unicode.UTF32.Parser.Encoding.EncodedScalar>
items.desc: Parses a single Unicode scalar value from input.
